Title: Step 2: Speaking with Curator Evelyn Marston
Text: I've arrived at the War Museum. My next step is to speak with Curator Evelyn Marston. She should be able to guide me through the museum and provide insights into the history of marksmanship in Gramados.
CompleteText: I’ve spoken with Curator Evelyn Marston. She’s offered to guide me through the museum and share the rich history of Gramados' marksmanship legacy. Time to explore the exhibits and learn more.
